CheckTitle: Check if AWS StorageGateway File Shares are running on EC2.
Description: Storage Gateway, when deployed on AWS, runs on a single EC2 instance. This is a single-point of failure for any applications expecting highly available access to application storage.
Risk: Running Storage Gateway as a mechanism for providing file-based application storage that require high-availability increases the risk of application outages if any AZ outages occur.

Recommendation.Text: Migrating workloads to Amazon EFS, FSx, or other storage services can provide higher availability architectures if required.
